name: CFNumberType
desc: Flags used by CFNumber to indicate the data type of a value.

items.name: case sInt8Type
items.desc: Eight-bit, signed integer. The SInt8 data type is defined in MacTypes.h.

items.name: case sInt16Type
items.desc: Sixteen-bit, signed integer. The SInt16 data type is defined in MacTypes.h.

items.name: case sInt32Type
items.desc: Thirty-two-bit, signed integer. The SInt32 data type is defined in MacTypes.h.

items.name: case sInt64Type
items.desc: Sixty-four-bit, signed integer. The SInt64 data type is defined in MacTypes.h.

items.name: case float32Type
items.desc: Thirty-two-bit real. The Float32 data type is defined in MacTypes.h.

items.name: case float64Type
items.desc: Sixty-four-bit real. The Float64 data type is defined in MacTypes.h and conforms to the 64-bit IEEE 754 standard.
